summary: Install exchange watcher and enable detection of pending orders; ACK receipt.

directives.details: Ensure tools/ exists; create if missing.
From workspace root, run: python -m tools.exchange_watcher --reset; confirm pending orders printed.
Update ACK to status 'received' with current timestamp in exchange/acknowledgements/pending/order-2025-10-15-017-ack.json.
Submit short report to exchange/reports/inbox/order-2025-10-15-017-report.json summarizing install outcome.
